CustomField.description: If this Deal is from Open Close, then this is the Open Close Loan Number. If this is a purchased loan, then this is the originating Lender's Loan Number
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this Deal is from Open Close, then this is the Open Close Loan Number. If this is a purchased loan, then this is the originating Lender's Loan Number
CustomField.label: External Deal ID
